mapper.select: select * from housewarming order by hwNum desc
SELECT H.*, HF.* from housewarming H left join hwFile HF on H.hwNum = HF.hwNum WHERE H.hwNum=#{hwNum}
mapper.insert: insert into housewarming (space, spaceSize, work, field, familyType, area, style, period, budget, totalTone, wallColor, bottomColor, detail, link, copyright, coverImg, title, username, contents) values(#{space}, #{spaceSize}, #{work}, #{field}, #{familyType}, #{area}, #{style}, #{period}, #{budget}, #{totalTone}, #{wallColor}, #{bottomColor}, #{detail}, #{link}, #{copyright}, 1, #{title}, #{username}, #{contents})
insert into hwFile (hwNum, fileName, originName) values (#{hwNum}, #{fileName}, #{originName})
mapper.update: update housewarming set hit=hit+1 where hwNum=#{hwNum}
